          <title>
            <string language="hu">A víz befagyása</string>
            <string language="en">freezing of water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einfrieren des Wassers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">congélation de l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">congelar-se da água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">congelamento dell'acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πάγωμα του ύδατος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el congelar del agua</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A víz - más folyadékokkal ellentétben - felülről lefelé fagy be</string>
            <string language="en">freezing of water as opposed to other liquids</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">folyadékok hőtágulása,  víz,  a víz sűrűsége,  jég,  tó,  </string>
            <string language="en">thermal extension of liquids, water, density of water, ice, lake</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einfrieren des Wassers im Vergleich mit anderen 
Flüssigkeiten</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">congélation de l'eau par opposition à d'autres 
liquides</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">congelar-se da água ao contrário de outros 
líquidos</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">congelamento dell'acqua in contrasto con altri 
liquidi</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πάγωμα του ύδατος σε αντιδιαστολή με άλλα υγρά</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el congelar del agua en comparación con otros 
líquidos</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">thermische Extension der Flüssigkeiten, Wasser, Dichte 
des Wassers, Eis, See</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">extension thermique des liquides, l'eau, densité de 
l'eau, glace, lac</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">extensão térmica dos líquidos, água, densidade da 
água, gelo, lago</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">estensione termica dei liquidi, acqua, densità di 
acqua, ghiaccio, lago</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θερμική επέκταση των υγρών, ύδωρ, πυκνότητα του ύδατος, 
πάγος, λίμνη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">extensión termal de líquidos, agua, densidad del agua,
hielo, lago</string>
